headline: Chipmakers Post Longest Win Streak Since 2017 Amid AI Growth
summary: The Philadelphia Stock Exchange Semiconductor Index rose 0.3% in its ninth straight positive session, its longest such streak since 2017.  Among notable movers, ON Semiconductor Corp. jumped 3%, Intel Corp. rose 2% and Applied Materials Inc. added 1.5%.  Broadcom Inc. sank 1.1% but is still up 55% in 2025.

headline: Energy Transition Today - Statkraft Sells Indian Assets To Serentica For Strategic Focus
summary: Statkraft, Europe’s largest producer of renewable energy, has entered into an agreement to sell part of its renewable energy portfolio in India to Serentica Renewables. This transaction involves a 1.5 GWp capacity in Rajasthan, consisting of an operational solar plant and a variety of solar and wind projects in different developmental stages. The move aligns with Statkraft's strategy to focus investments on core markets in Europe and South America, reinforcing their commitment to the global...

headline: Nazhar Adnan, Former CBO at Sonocharge and Director at Temasek, Joins TeraWatt Technology as Chief Commercial Officer
summary: TeraWatt Technology Inc. (Headquartered in California, USA) is delighted to announce the appointment of Nazhar Adnan as Chief Commercial Officer.
